import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Header from './components/Header'; import Post from './components/Post'; import Story from './components/Story'; import './App.css' const Mat = () => { // const [date, setDate] = useState({}); // const container = { dates: [date, setDate] } let [stt, setStt] = useState(true); let [number, setNumber] = useState(0); const avatars = [ 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3d/DC_Comics_logo.svg/1200px-DC_Comics_logo.svg.png', 'https://anikod.mn//img/ogimage.jpg', 'https://img.favpng.com/24/25/13/batman-logo-joker-bat-signal-dc-comics-png-favpng-14y3Ws8Lt0KJmMRHc2yD11vsN.jpg', 'https://anikod.mn//img/ogimage.jpg' ]; const names = [ 'Dc', 'aniKod', 'Batman', 'aniKod' ]; const images = [ [ 'https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/marvel_dc/images/8/8c/Superman_Prime.jpg/revision/latest/top-crop/width/360/height/450?cb=20131230001603', 'https://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11135/111358166/6775244-prime.jpg', 'https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-d7452720a5e4d941e914a550da71943e' ], [ "https://i.ytimg.com/vi/t5SLsbg8zPU/maxresdefault.jpg", "https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WXt4JB2fSo4/maxresdefault.jpg" ], ["https://i2.wp.com/batman-news.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Batman-Comic-Generic-09.jpg?resize=696%2C391&quality=80&strip=info&ssl=1"], ["https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1559145257l/46038930._SY475_.jpg"] ] const story_avatars = [ 'https://img.favpng.com/24/25/13/batman-logo-joker-bat-signal-dc-comics-png-favpng-14y3Ws8Lt0KJmMRHc2yD11vsN.jpg', 'https://instagram.fuln2-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t51.2885-19/s150x150/76844870_2735946593133365_7586026101554544640_n.jpg?_nc_ht=instagram.fuln2-1.fna.fbcdn.net&_nc_ohc=AkHYh2kTbpUAX9EOlvH&oh=b55ee92cab6f1bcc74dd5f39a66a668b&oe=5EBDABCA', '/home/soulforger/Desktop/instagram-demo/src/img/avatar_story/blackPink.jpg' ];
